name: Träd
description:
A short showroom 2D experience inspired by a stop motion animation movie created by Linus Saxvik. This very short game shows works and art created by wool and clay/Plasticine.
(This is a standalone experience, but also used to test the art for a potential game.)

Thank you for playing!

Animation movie:
